data.scheme_name: Entrepreneur Support Scheme (ESS) - For General category (Female Entrepreneurs) - Existing
data.benefits: The scheme provides financial assistance in the form of subsidies up to 45% for investment in fixed assets, capped at Rs. 40 Lakhs.
data.eligibility: All existing MSME units engaged in manufacturing activities in the State are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
An application fee of Rs. 1105  has to be remitted per unit.
An enterprise in which at least 50% of the promoters are women.
Units must have filed Entrepreneurs Memorandum Part I/II.
Units must execute an agreement with the notified authority to avail the assistance.
Units must be  independent legal entity. 
The applicant unit after availing the assistance shall furnish copies of balance sheets, valid license from local body.
data.beneficiaries: All existing MSME units engaged in manufacturing activities in the State are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
An application fee of Rs. 1105  has to be remitted per unit.
An enterprise in which at least 50% of the promoters are women.
Units must have filed Entrepreneurs Memorandum Part I/II.
Units must execute an agreement with the notified authority to avail the assistance.
Units must be  independent legal entity. 
The applicant unit after availing the assistance shall furnish copies of balance sheets, valid license from local body.
data.context: Government has launched this scheme for promoting/sponsoring, registering, financing and advising MSME (Micro Small and Medium Enterprise) industries in the State.
data.objective: The scheme aims to extend support to micro, small and medium enterprises and support to entrepreneurs by optimal utilization of funds and by giving more flexibility of operation.
data.description:
• Scheme provides assistance of 20% of the fixed capital investment limited to Rs. 30 lakhs. Young (18-45 years) & NRK entrepreneurs: 25% assistance, up to Rs 40 lakh. 
  • Priority sector enterprises: Additional 10% assistance, up to Rs 10 lakh. 
  • Enterprises in Idukki, Wayanad, Kasargode, Pathanamthitta: Additional 10% assistance, up to Rs 10 lakh. 
  • Enterprises adopting new technology: Additional 10% assistance, up to Rs 10 lakh. 
  • Total eligible assistance: Capped at Rs 40 lakh.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply by registering themselves on the provided webpage- http://schemes.industry.kerala.gov.in/public/index.
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefit in their bank account after the approval from the concerned auhtority.
data.additional_info:
Enterprises under Priority Sector : Rubber-based industries, Agro based and Food processing industries, Readymade Garments, Industries manufacturing equipment and machinery for non conventional energy generation, Biotechnology based industries, 100% export oriented units, Biodegradable plastic industries, Plastic waste recycling industries, Bio fertilizer industries, Pharmaceutical industries and healthcare products manufacturing industries. 

Negative list of industries: Service Enterprises, Photo Studios and Colour Processing Centres, Tailoring other than manufacturing of readymade garments, Breweries and Distilleries of all types, Saw mills, Soap Grade Sodium Silicate, Asbestos processing, Metal Crushers including Granite Manufacturing units, All types of Steel Re rolling Mills, Units manufacturing iron ingots, Calcium Carbide, Cement manufacturing except units manufacturing cement from fly ash, Potassium Chlorate, Power intensive units. 

Specific Districts: Idukki, Wayanad, Kasaragode, Pathanamthitta
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Application (duly signed by the applicant, in case of partnership firm all partners shall sign)
2. Acknowledgement receipt
3. Copy of Challan/receipt towards payment of fees (self-attested)
4. Copy of Voters ID/Passport/Ration Card/Driving license of the promoter/promoters (attested by Gazetted officer) (in case applying for assistance under young entrepreneurs the document furnished shall show the Date of birth of the applicant)
5. Self attested copy of resolution towards applying for this assistance in case of units other than proprietory
6. Self attested copy of Acknowledgement of EM (EM part I in case of application for Startup support and part II for other assistances)
7. Copy of Caste Certificate (attested by Gazetted officer) (in case applying for assistance under SC/ST entrepreneurs)
8. Copy of the Project Report (Self attested)
9. Other relevant documents (as required)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Directorate of Industries Commerce, Vikas Bhavan P.O,Thiruvananthapuram Kerala 695033
Email : industriesdirectorate@gmail.com
Call : +91- 471-2302774
data.beneficiary: Specific Manufacturing Industry - Partnership, Limited Liability Partnership (LLP), Private Limited Company, Public Company, Self Help Group, Co-Operative - Kerala - All MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
